types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type json = {| first: String, last: String, department: String |} {"example": "{\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"}"}

types:type.name: update
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type update = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, first: String, last: String, department: String |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"}"}
